subject: Coaches and Managers
Football
lead_paragraph: The Browns’ Rob Chudzinski, the Redskins’ Mike Shanahan, the Vikings’ Leslie Frazier, the Lions’ Jim Schwartz and the Bucs’ Greg Schiano lost their coaching jobs Monday after poor years.
snippet: The Browns’ Rob Chudzinski, the Redskins’ Mike Shanahan, the Vikings’ Leslie Frazier, the Lions’ Jim Schwartz and the Bucs’ Greg Schiano lost their coaching jobs Monday after poor years.
